quote: "If you're looking for proper restaurant quality food at home look no further."
"So many thanks for all your delicious and very very pretty food this weekend. Life is transformed when you are here!"
"Thank you once again for the very delicious meal, sweet potato fries were so tasty, just brilliant as ever."
"I have just had the best chicken pie I have ever eaten. The flavours were out of this world. What was going to be a dull evening changed completely, thank you."
"We have just had your supper and it was outstanding, it made a very odd birthday in lockdown pretty perfect."
"Thank you so much for the wonderful food. It was incredible! So delish!"
"One of the many compliments your food got last night was from a friend called Sandy who said if he was made to eat one meal for the rest of his life it would be your lamb and aubergine."

"Thanks so much for pulling out the stops at short notice on Monday. The food was really delicious, and we all greatly enjoyed it. Wonderful marinade for the steaks and fantastic panna cotta, in particular."
"Every meal was wonderfully inventive, perfectly cooked and beautifully presented."
"We all thought your picnic food was delicious, thank you so much! Very smart bee packaging, containing delicious, fresh food for us to enjoy!"
"Having you and your team meant I could completely relax and enjoy my own party which was a real treat."
"Thank you for leaving the kitchen so beautifully tidy. The whole evening was such a success and that was largely due to you and your lovely team."
"Without a doubt, Katy was the best chef we have ever had on a skiing holiday"
'Katy"s skills are exceptional. Her food is unbelievably delicious and innovative. As a family who all love cooking and eating delicious food Katy surpassed our expectations.'
"Not only is Katy a great chef but her work space was always immaculate. She is a joy to have around and we all love her."
"Thank you for making our collective stay so delicious and pleasant. You are an incredible talented chef, and a beautiful person"
"The food was wonderful, you are very talented. Thank you so much."
"Without a doubt, Katy was the best chef we have ever had on a skiing holiday"
"It was a pleasure to have Katy in the chalet, she was at all times professional, polite and cheerful and went above and beyond the call of duty to ensure we had an enjoyable and memorable stay."
